content: this text is a legal document explaining the progress of a divorce case between a belgian man and woman they were married in 2016 and have a child together the couple has agreed to proceed with a mutual consent divorce and have made agreements regarding their rights and the division of their assets the document also mentions that the woman is currently pregnant the agreement covers various aspects such as the inventory of shared belongings division of financial assets ownership of property settlement of debts and arrangements for the care and support of their child they agree to waive any claims for alimony and finalize the divorce through mutual consent the chosen court for the divorce proceedings is specified and the agreement is exempt from registration in addition there is mention of a persons bankruptcy and the divestment of their property the parties involved acknowledge their obligations and confirm that they have been informed of their rights and charges related to the deed the notary fee for drafting the deed is €750 the parties had sufficient time to review the draft deed before signing it in the presence of the notary
